title: katrinastar
author: katrinastar
content: Our service will allow you to remove clothes from any girl in the photo with a 100% guarantee.Our Features:- Absolutely anonymous (no need to create an account, payment by cryptocurrency, we do not save generations history)- Free test- The cheapest prices on the market (from $0.15 per processing)- Try to undress your girlfriend, classmate or colleague! Just upload a photo and look how she looks without clothes! Link: https://nodress.artimator.iohttps://nude.nodress.artimator.io/32523.jpg

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: bad/crap aiif you look at clothed models 6 pack vs nudes lack of 6pack, its not even the same. tits are also wrongly angled sized and positionedtan is differentit almost as bad as just cut and pasting heads onto different bodyid rate it as something good enough for socially awkward kids to fantasise about their peers. but not good enough to be "100% clothing remover"it needs more workatleast making the nude match muscle/fat tone of uploaded image and also the tan

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Generative AI seems more active in the porn industry than it is elsewhere. I once worked with a firm which uses generative AI for various erotic displays and most people took advantage of it and used it to open ONLYFAN pages and twitter accounts.  Why aren't other projects taking advantage of the solution AI presents? The concept here is laudable and I look towards testing its features.
